original: Niyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: niyyānikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Aniyyānikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: aniyyānikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Aniyyānikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ dve paccayavasena.)
analyzed: aniyyānikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam dve paccaya vasena
